name: Tom And Jerry Jungle Adventure
description:
The Tyke is missing from the home according to the Spyke he is kidnapped and is asking help from Tom and Jerry to find Tyke and take him home. So Tom and Jerry decided to find Tyke in the Jungle and get him back to Spyke. Help the Tom and Jerry solve mysterious puzzles to cross the deadly traps and find Tyke deep down the Jungle then take the Tyke back to home.

THIS IS JUST A PROTOTYPE VERSION MEANS IT IS UNDER_DEVELOPMENT. AND I AS AN INDIE GAME DEVELOPER NEED SOME SUPPORT FROM YOU ALL TO WORK ON THIS GAME. I ALSO HAVE A PLAN TO ADD MULTIPLAYER IN WHICH ONE PLAYER PLAYS AS TOM AND OTHER PLAYS AS JERRY TO SOLVE THE PUZZLES. CURRENTLY I HAVE STOPPED WORKING ON THE PROJECT BUT I WILL DECIDE WHETHER TO WORK ON IT OR NOT FROM YOUR FEEDBACKS AND RESPONSE.

MY TARGET IS TO GET 30$ FROM THIS GAME THEN I CONTINUE WORKING ON IT.
